title: Zucchini Carpaccio
introduction: Zucchini Carpaccio is a refreshing and vibrant salad that combines the crispness of thinly sliced zucchini with the zesty flavor of freshly squeezed lemon juice. Enhanced with mint and adorned with shavings of Parmigiano-Reggiano, this dish is a perfect balance of freshness and savory notes, making it a delightful starter or side dish.
ingredients: 2 or 3 small zucchini, preferably a mix of yellow and green
Salt and freshly ground black pepper
instructions: Scrub the zucchini with a brush under cold running water. Trim off the ends.
In a food processor or on a mandoline slicer, cut the zucchini into very thin slices. Place the slices in a medium bowl.

In a small bowl, whisk together the lemon juice, olive oil, and salt and pepper to taste until blended. Stir in the mint. Drizzle over the zucchini and toss well. Spread the slices out on a shallow platter.
With a vegetable peeler, shave the Parmigiano into thin slices. Scatter the slices over the zucchini. Serve immediately.
